New Records: Washington Sundar clobbered 50 off 28 against New Zealand in the first T20I on January 27, 2023, joining MS Dhoni in the elite club of Indian batters who have scored 50-plus runs batting at no.6 or below in T20Is.
Key Match Events: India lost the first T20I against New Zealand by 21 runs despite Washington Sundar's all-round show.
